tool.name: NabBuildDnaStructure
tool.description: : Wrapper of the AmberTools (AMBER MD Package) nab tool module.
tool.command:
#if $config.sele == "option1": ln -s -f ${config.properties} ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
nab_build_dna_structure
#if $config.sele == "option1": --config ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext} #else if $config.sele == "option2": --config '${config.jsonstr}' #else if $config.sele == "option3": --config '__oc____dq__sequence__dq__:__dq__${properties.sequence}__dq__,__dq__helix_type__dq__:__dq__${properties.helix_type}__dq__,__dq__compiler__dq__:__dq__${properties.compiler}__dq__,__dq__linker__dq__:__dq__${properties.linker}__dq__,__dq__binary_path__dq__:__dq__${properties.binary_path}__dq____cc__' #end if
--output_pdb_path $outname_output_pdb_path ; #if $config.sele == "option1": rm -f ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
if test -f $outname_output_pdb_path; then mv $outname_output_pdb_path $output_pdb_path; fi;

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: sequence
param.label: sequence
param.help: Nucleotide sequence to convert to a 3D structure. Nucleotides should be written in 1-letter code, with no spaces between them.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the nab executable binary.
